short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download an .ics file for your UWO schedule and import it into a calendar of your choice!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're a University of Western Ontario student, you can use this Chrome extension to import your class schedule from Draft My Schedule into an .ics file. This .ics file can then be imported into Google calendar, Apple calendar, Outlook, etc.
